title: Critical demotion
body: I got a red demotion shield error saying i was critically close to demotion, i was at gold 5 0 lp, it said if i didnt win more games i would be demoted. However now after 3 wins in a row i am at 40 lp gold 5. But it still has the critical demotion signal. can someone assist me

replies.body: It sounds like that might have been the usual demotion warning once you get low enough, simply letting you know that you were close to demoting. Is that shield still showing for you now?

I think this might mean that if you drop to 0 LP again you might still be demoted quickly. It has to do with hidden MMR ofcourse, though this behaviour might not be intended. I'd leave that to a Rito employee ^^''
